definitions: The act of lifting or moving something to a higher position.
The act of increasing the amount, level, or strength of something.
The act of collecting or gathering money or support.
The act of bringing up or caring for a child or animal.
The act of causing something to appear or come into existence.
examples: The raising of the flag was a solemn moment.
They are raising funds for a new community center.
The raising of livestock is common in this region.
The constant raising of prices is a concern.
The raising of questions led to a lively debate.
